channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Loose and Noisy Fire Hydrant Cover After Second Replacement, 17th September
item.description:
Fire hydrant cover is loose, knocking and loud. Cover and frame was replaced as part of Pirton lane resurfacing. First cover was immediately loose and noisy. Issue reported direct to contractors who replaced cover with alternative. Feedback was new cover may not be good enough as frame may be warped. Contractor advised new cover would be tried before frame replacement was considered. New cover is now loose and noisy again with every car that drives over it. Now causing disruption to local business with continual noise intrusion.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 207, Pirton Lane, Churchdown, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TTLs on green for 2 directions at the same time, 17th September
item.description:
TTLs at the top of Paynes Pitch are on green for traffic from Hucclecote and traffic from Drews Court at the same time. There is no indication that this is happening and I was nearly knocked off my bike proceeding on a green light, unaware that traffic would be approaching from the other direction as well.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Drews Court, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Flytip on Cleeve Common Road - Pylons Butterfly Field Gate area, 17th September
item.description:
The location is to the left of the field gate (see photograph) to the Pylons Butterfly field on Cleeve common road (about 20 yards before the Car Park area. The tipped material consists of electrical appliance, board and other stuff. Across the road on the opposite verge from the tip is also more rubbish. Please can this be cleared up as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass, 16th September
item.description:
Underpass on Elmbridge court roundabout. Under A40. Lots of broken glass. Needs a road sweeper that is able to sweep up the tiny shards. Hard to see in certain lights but theres lots of it. Not great for dogs paws. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmbridge Court Roundabout, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole/sunken cover, 16th September
item.description:
Large pothole/sunken cover creates loud noise and vibration when lorries and cars driver over it. So loud can even be felt, whole house shakes - this has been ongoing for a longtime and despite several reports by various residents it still continues
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Gotherington, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement dropped and cracked badly, 16th September
item.description:
Pavement repair is urgently needed outside 169 Hewlett Road. Also kerb stones are incorrect for drive. Wheelchair users and elderly have almost lost their footing in several occasions over the years. Been like this, and getting worse, for over 8/9 years now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 165, Hewlett Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A large area of fly tipping alongside the B4634 at the Junction of Tewkesbury Road,by the Gallagher Retail Park. This is in front of the entrance to ‘Greensteps’. It is used as a lorry park, 16th September
item.description:
This area is used as a lorry park, and is a long standing problem . There are no litter bins. This is in front of ‘Greensteps’, the Star Centre, Horticultural Centre.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extremely loud bang every time a vehicle drives over the drain cover. No way on earth this has been inspected!!!! The only explanation is that the wrong drain was assessed. Please address this as a matter of urgency!!, 16th September
item.description:
It is ridiculous to email me and inform me that this has been inspected. There is no way anyone in their right mind could stand for longer than a minute and not hear the bang from this drain cover. There are two drains next to each other outside of the property 111 Winchcombe st, only one is making a noise. It needs addressing ASAP please. This is causing significant disturbance to my family.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 111, Winchcombe Street, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pathing area uneven, 16th September
item.description:
The section of pathing area at the front of the main Bournside School entrance is uneven. A lady fell and badly cut her face. There are roughly 4000 people that walk over these labs on a weekly basis. Could this area be tarmac instead?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Warden Hill Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The sign is illegible problem, 16th September
item.description:
email rcvd 16.09.24 - After a nasty encounter on the A417 near the Walls ice cream factory where a car that cut through the opening just before the Barnet way roundabout.( East bound) I was on a motorcycle and very nearly taken off and the motorist had not seen me so I had reason to go back and check. The motorist said there was nothing to say it was illegal to do a U turn at the opening in the centre reservation On looking there is a no u turn sign west bound but nothing east bound can you look at this or pass it to those who can the only sign is telling motorist to go around the roundabout to access The coroners court on the west bound carriage way
Report on FixMyStreet
